Ward B - Rory A. Robertson
==========================

##### Elected November 2020; Re-Elected May 2023City of Katy 2021 - 34 Web - Robertson, Rory

Rory Robertson was elected on November 3, 2020 as a Ward B Councilmember. He grew up in Katy, Texas and has been employed in the financial industry and with Katy Independent School District for many years.

Councilmember Robertson is passionate about community involvement in his hometown and is a member of the Katy Heritage Society. He is an advocate for various local organizations, a former Katy Tiger and college athlete, and is active in coaching youth sports. Councilmember Robertson has served as a Volunteer Board Member in Katy Youth Football organization for many years where he has been instrumental in the programs growth and mentored countless students in the community.

Rory's wife is also an educator in Katy, and their children are another proud generation of Katy High School students and Katy residents.

To contact him directly, please email [councilmembers@cityofkaty.com](mailto:)
